#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
using  namespace std;
int main()
{
	int n,k;
	cin>>n;
	if(n>=5)
	{
		k=n/5;
		cout<<k<<"\n";
		n=n%5;
	}
	else
		cout<<"0"<<"\n";
	if(n>=3)
	{
		k=n/3;
		cout<<k<<"\n";
		n=n%3;
	}
		else
		cout<<"0"<<"\n";
	if(n>=2)
	{
		k=n/2;
		cout<<k<<"\n";
		n=n%2;
	}
		else
		cout<<"0"<<"\n";
	if(n>=1)
	{
		k=n/1;
		cout<<k<<"\n";
	}
		else
		cout<<"0"<<"\n";
	return 0;
}
